comment: This class is super easy. There is not a lot or work to do. 2 exams and 3 quizzes. He gives extra credit points which can help your grade. He is very reachable via after class or email.

Prof Burns is super caring and you can tell he is passionate about teaching the class. He gives a lot of in-class extra credit opportunities and also posts some extra credit assignments online. In class, we go over PowerPoints that have EVERYTHING you need to do well on quizzes and exams. Do yourself a favor and please take him if he is available:)
Amazing professor. Genuinely cares about his students success. Wish every professor was like Prof Burns
Very down to earth and respectful, you can tell he truly has a passion and love for teaching, if youre looking for a welcoming learning environment that rewards effort, this is the one!

I was very nervous about taking accounting. Professor Burns really changed that. He is very passionate about accounting as well as student success. Going to class is pretty essential for any accounting course, but he does a great job at making lectures exciting. Take this professor!

Accounting is hard, but he realizes that and adds a lot of extra credit. He always answers his email and is kind. He will open your uncompleted homework back up for you if you need. His tests and quizzes are kind of hard, even as open note. You have plenty other options to raise your grade. Recommend!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: You have a pack back and connect hw due every week. There is plenty of extra credit and he wants everyone to pass. He is also kinda funny.

Believe it or not, this man is very passionate in the world of accounting, and he really converts his passion for accounting into his teaching. He makes it very easy to learn about accounting and the way he grades makes it a lot easier to get a better grade. There's plenty of extra credit and bonus things you can do to get more points as well.
